snippet.title: Spyragon: All-Star Stars
snippet.description:
Spyragon is available to play on the iOS App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/spyragon/id1584715775

In Spyragon Classic, creating Stars is a cornerstone to progressing in the game.  Not only do Stars add to the score, but they also create Paths which are building-blocks for Full-Hexagons.   The bigger the Star, the bigger the Path and score boost.  In this video, see some techniques for creating giant Stars, including multiple 9+ pointed Stars, and even an insane 16-pointed Star!

Directions available at: https://spyraverse.com

Also follow us on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @spyraverse

#Spyragon #Spyraverse #gaming #mobilegames #mobilegaming #iosgames #ios #hypercasual #newgames
